red-hat-enterprise-linux-7-security-tech.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Security Technical Implementation Guide (STIG)

v-204424.name: v-204424 - The Red Hat Enterprise Linux operating system must not have accounts configured with blank or null passwords.
v-204424.description: If an account has an empty password, anyone could log on and run commands with the privileges of that account. Accounts with empty passwords should never be used in operational environments.
